title: Mismatched ranked game
body:
So today got into silver 1, but the game i won to actually get promoted seems way too mismatched to make sense.

http://i.imgur.com/yNRqYM3.png

Gold 2, Gold 5, Silver 3, Silver 4, Unranked

V

Silver 2, Silver 2, Bronze 2, Unranked, Unranked.

In what fucking realm is this actually matched up right?

replies.body:
NAME AND SHAME (not really shame) GET HIM!!

But seriously stop using that AIDS site and use op.gg/lolnexus

rank =/= mmr
that's what you get for abusing sejuani freelo

>that's what you get for abusing sejuani freelo

I get to carry myself into silver 1?

I can't help it that my number 1 jungler is freelo and that they didn't ban her.

EDIT: and as a note, i'm aware that rank and MMR are different, but even then, this is so mismatched that it seems off (especially with the 3 unranked's in the game.)
As you level up your account you get an MMR and this is slightly used to help place where you should be at. It's possible that these are alt accounts for people and they're only doing placement now.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8eUHAEzQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-20T09:34:53.891+0000)
>
> that's what you get for abusing sejuani freelo

Build armor and take the free win.

Irelia and Vi are most likely a duo, plus two unrankeds could have high gold elo from last season.
